bibl.title: The Alexandrian Character in Classical Antiquity. Avec résumé en anglais.
Alexandrian Studies in memoriam Daoud Abdu Daoud

series.title: Bulletin de la Société [Royale] d'Archéologie d'Alexandrie
BSAA

bibl.note: An attribute of the Alexandrian character persists throughout the history of the city: this is the independent and defiant attitude of its population towards authority. An interpretation of this character within a regional context provides an approach to its particular traits.
